Summary: There were 4 royal blue lights going back and forth changing directions behind a tree.
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around May 5th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about to go up the stairs to my apartment when a blue light through the tree about 100 feet away caught my eye. I focused on it abd saw that there were four royal blue lights. Three in triangle shape with one in the middle. I tried to get a clear look at it but it seemed to try to stay out of my direct line of sight. I ran down a hallway under my apartment to get a better look and wasnt able to see it again. From the moment I saw it to right know I still have this feeling that I have to see it. I will be watching all night.
